about_the_game:
Welcome to the dark world of childhood nightmares, where every room is a challenge, and every fight is a test of courage.

Step into the shoes of Cooper, a young hero trapped in an abandoned orphanage filled with reawakened childhood memories. Plush bears, toys, clowns, and robots—seemingly innocent things have transformed into dark monsters that stand in your way. To survive, you must fight, explore, and develop your skills as you navigate procedurally generated rooms packed with challenges.

Gather essence from defeated enemies and use it to play the mysterious "GrowMachine.” The rewards you earn will unlock new possibilities—granting abilities that allow you to delve deeper into the orphanage and uncover its secrets.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic melee combat: Intuitive controls and reflex-based gameplay deliver thrilling action.

  • Procedurally generated levels: Every playthrough is a fresh challenge—you never know what lies behind the next door.

  • Unique art style: Hand-drawn, frame-by-frame animations give the game a distinctive look.

  • Dark, magical atmosphere: The abandoned orphanage holds many secrets, balancing fear and wonder.

Embark on an emotional adventure that pushes the limits of courage and perseverance. Will Cooper conquer the nightmares of childhood and find light within the darkness?
